camelcase-keys

Convert object keys to camelCase using camelcase

Install

sh $ npm install --save camelcase-keys

Usage

```js var camelcaseKeys = require(‘camelcase-keys’);

camelcaseKeys({‘foo-bar’: true}); //=> {fooBar: true}

var argv = require(‘minimist’)(process.argv.slice(2)); //=> {_: [], ‘foo-bar’: true}

camelcaseKeys(argv); //=> {_: [], fooBar: true} ```
